explanation: [0-0] The background is a nighttime environment, with a white machine hanging above, illuminated by light. A wooden floor can be seen below the machine with an opening in the middle. A small stream of white exhaust is visible from the machine's outlet. In the distance, there are silver-gray railings.
[0-2] White smoke billows from the outlet under the machine, quickly enveloping the device. As the smoke dissipates, a blue light illuminates in the middle of the upper part of the device.
